name: MyBurger
description:
Responsive burger restaurant React web app, built for managing hamburger ingredients & orders.
 Build with: ReactJS, Redux, NodeJS, Express, JWT & MongoDB  
1.Register/Login
2.Easily build your burger ingredients
 3.Fill your address for delivery
4.Order!
5. Check your orders history

name: Sentimental Analysis Web Tool
description:
Web tool processes recent twitted tweetes data opinion about any subject you like and supplies some interesting information about.
Built with: NodeJS, Express & Twitter API.

name: MyAppartment
description:
Roommates Android app helping us to manage bills & expenses properly.
1. Register and create your "room" and become your apartment manager
2. I room is existing, register and join existing room
3. Get expenses info about yout roomates

name: Evil twin attack
description: Built in cyber security course, Python app for phishing gmail accounts by creating fake AP & fake gmail login page, Apache server, spamming deAuth packets.

name: Camping forum
description: Web app forum for camping lovers, functionalities: registration, login, add/remove/edit posts.
